summary.span: 同時提供群組控制項的功能。

span.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單代表最外層的 ASP.NET mobile Web 網頁內的控制項群組。A form represents the outermost grouping of controls within an ASP.NET mobile Web page. 個別的 mobile Web 網頁可以包含在最外層的層級的多個表單。An individual mobile Web page can contain multiple forms at the outermost level. 表單不能巢狀;使用控制，如果您想要建立巢狀容器。Forms cannot be nested; use controls if you want to nest containers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 表單控制項簡介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Form Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/dxzx3ss0(v=vs.85)). 若要顯示特定的表單，請將目前的屬性頁面，即可想要的格式，或設定屬性中的表單所需的指導方針。To display a specific form, either set the property on the current page to the desired form, or set the property in a control to the desired form. 您可以包含常值文字，以及其隨附的標記中的文字內容控制項。You can include literal text along with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the control. 當使用範本，是要切記控制項建立範本中的執行個體表單的方法。When using templates, it is important to remember that the control creates instances of templates in the method for the form. 表單的方法之前呼叫`Page_Load`和`Page_Init`。The method for the form is called before `Page_Load` and `Page_Init`. 此外，頁面建構函式執行過早設定的範本中方法因為尚未建立表單。Also, the page constructor executes too early to set templates in the method because the form is not yet created. 若要修正此問題，將表單的自己方法，並建立那里範本的執行個體。To correct this, hook the form's own method, and create an instance of the template there. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作樣板化的轉譯](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922)。For more information, see [Implementing Templated Rendering](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有兩種形式，以及兩個形式之間的連結的網頁。The following code example shows how to create a page with two forms along with links between the two forms. 一種格式具有核取方塊的清單。One form has a check box list. 選取的項目時，**送出**按一下按鈕時，表單就會顯示選取的項目和其值的清單。When items are selected and the **Submit** button is clicked, the form presents a list of the selected items and their values. 請注意，事件方法準備個別的表單以顯示Notice that the event methods prepare the respective forms for display > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值、 空字串 ("")，會造成回傳至頁面包含目前的表單。The default value, an empty string (""), causes postbacks to the page containing the current form. 您可以覆寫要提交至不同的 URL 格式的預設值。You can override the default value to submit the form to a different URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性繼承，控制項回傳至繼承的 URL 的格式內容。If the property is inherited, the control posts form contents to the inherited URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件，就會發生下列情況下：The event occurs under the following circumstances: - 第一次要求頁面時，就會啟動第一種形式。When a page is first requested, the first form is activated. - 當頁的屬性以程式設計方式設定。When the property of the page is set programmatically. - 當使用者瀏覽至表單，以透過其目標是一種形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 這個事件的事件鏈結中的位置會繫結至資料來源的子控制項，或設定可以繼承的所有子控制項的表單屬性非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important for binding child controls to data sources or for setting a form property that can be inherited by all child controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定`OnActivate`屬性中項目指向方法時執行就會發生事件。The following code example shows how to set the `OnActivate` attribute in the element to point to a method that executes when the event occurs. `Form2_Activate`方法準備第二種形式顯示。The `Form2_Activate` method prepares the second form for display. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#8)]

span.span: The control on the form that can be paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來允許將其內容分頁跨行動裝置和提供的下一步] 和 [上一個導覽檢視之間的數個檢視的表單上的單一控制項。The property is used to allow a single control on a form to paginate its contents across several views on mobile devices and providing next and previous navigation between views. 控制項可以將分頁其內容，即使其中包含控制項都有其屬性設定為`false`。A control can paginate its contents even if a containing control has its property set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性類別，以指定哪一個編頁控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the class to specify which control to paginate. 此範例建立兩種形式的頁面。The example creates a page with two forms. 一種格式有很長的字串，在某些裝置上必須要授與使用者存取權的所有文字分頁。One form has a very long string that on some devices must be paginated to give the user access to the entire text. 若要查看執行中的分頁，您必須處理分頁的裝置上檢視的範例。In order to see the pagination in action, you must view the example on a device that handles pagination. 在 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您可以使用其中一個裝置模擬器隨附**Device Emulator Manager**上**工具**功能表。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can use one of the device emulators available with the **Device Emulator Manager** on the **Tools** menu. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#4)]

param.name: doDataBind
param.span: 如果具現化的樣板必須繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一個要求上)，則設定為 true。

span.span: Set to true if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果樣板不必繫結至資料，而是依賴檢視狀態將資料填入 (通常發生在後續回傳時)，則會設定為 false。

span.span: Set to false if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單變成非使用中，在下列情況下：A form becomes inactive under the following circumstances: - 當頁的屬性以程式設計方式設定另一個表單。When the property of the page is programmatically set to another form. - 當使用者瀏覽至表單，以透過其目標是一種形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 如果這些動作都無法發生時，作用中的表單將不會收到事件。If neither of these actions occurs, the active form will never receive a event. 這個事件的事件鏈結中的位置可讓您在重設子控制項、 資料集或全域變數非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important in resetting the child controls, data set, or global variables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何捕捉事件，以清除。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event to clear the . 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IList GetLinkedForms(int32 optimumPageWeight) cil managed
Public Function GetLinkedForms (optimumPageWeight As Integer) As IList

param.name: optimumPageWeight
param.span: 目標裝置的總權重，結果連結的表單不得超過此權重 (用於分頁)。

span.span: The total weight for the target device of the resulting linked forms must not exceed (used in pagination).

param.span: 若其值為 -1，則將連結的表單加入至清單時，不會考慮總權數。

span.span: If its value is -1, the total weight will not be considered when linked forms are added to the list.

summary.span: 傳回連結至目前表單的一組表單。

span.span: Returns a set of forms that are linked to the current form.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 連結至目前表單的一組表單。

span.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單包含啟動另一個表單，而不需要與伺服器互動的瀏覽項目時，它會被視為連結的表單。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interacting with the server, it is considered to be a linked form. 有數個因素相關視為 表單的連結。There are several factors involved for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果下列三個條件都符合，表單 B 則皆為其中一種形式連結至表單：For example, if the following three stipulations are met, Form B is considered to be one of the forms linked to Form A: - 包含表單的控制項與表單 B.作為其目的地Form A contains a control with its destination as Form B. - 表單的不包含事件處理常式。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 表單 B 沒有事件處理常式。Form B has no event handler. 不同的是一組不需要將控制項之間的伺服器互動的所有表單。The distinction is the set of all forms that do not require server interactions to transfer control between.

span.span: Introduction to the Form Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`get`要求會受限於它可以張貼的資料量。A `get` request is limited in the amount of data it can post. 回傳的某些類型可能會失敗，當使用`get`要求。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a `get` request. 利用`get`要求為所有參數都指定為可以快取或儲存 URL 和 URL 的一部分。The advantage of a `get` request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and the URL can be cached or saved. 項目`post`要求內含。The elements of a `post` request are contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當通知由這個方法時，伺服器控制項必須執行建立和設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在這個階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項時呼叫這個方法是，無論它是子網域或此控制項的父代。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called either, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他伺服器控制項不一定是已建立並準備好進行存取。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會公開屬性和屬性，提供目前的表單重新編頁的相關資訊。The control exposes the property and the property, which provide information about how the current form is paginated. 屬性也可協助提供到另一個頁面的瀏覽功能。The property also helps provide navigation capability to another page. 比方說，當呈現更豐富的裝置上，搜尋結果表單可能包含裝置特定 UI 項目，讓使用者在瀏覽至 結果數目，而不是以連結巡覽頁面。For example, when rendering on a richer device, a search results form might include device-specific UI elements that allow the user to browse to a page of results by number rather than by link navigation. > [!NOTE] > 這個值後可供使用事件已發生。This value is available after the event has occurred. 若要取得屬性，您可以處理形式的事件。To get the property, you can handle the event of the form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control. 這個程式碼範例是針對較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example for the property. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以程式設計方式設定這個屬性，它不會保存每個要求。If this property is set programmatically, it is not persisted for each request. 如果以宣告方式設定屬性，屬性會保存每個要求。If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted for each request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是來自較大的範例如屬性。This code example is from a larger example for the property. span.span: The title can be rendered as part of the form, on devices that support a title separate from page content (for example, on the title bar of a browser using the title tag in HTML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的裝置以外的網頁內容的標題，您可以轉譯為表單一部分的標題。For devices that support a title separate from the page content, you can render the title as part of the form.
